entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming north 30 km/h this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
